鼽字的基本解释

鼽
qiú
（鼻孔）堵塞：“使鼻鼽不通。”

鼽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
(1)鼻塞不通。
(2)鼻流清涕。
(3)面颊；颧骨。

鼽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼻字部】　鼽； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1530第06
【唐韻】巨鳩切【集韻】【韻會】渠尤切，?音裘。【說文】病寒鼻窒也。【釋名】鼻塞曰鼽。鼽，久也。涕久不通，遂至窒塞也。【廣雅】鼽，病也。【禮·月令】季秋行夏令，民多鼽嚏。

暂无。

congested nose
Basic explanation of words
congested nose
qiú
(Nostril) Blockage: "Making the allergic nose blocked."
congested nose
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
(1) Obstruction of nasal congestion.
(2) Runny nose and clear tears.
(3) Cheeks; cheekbones.
congested nose
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Nose Department] 　鼽; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1530 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Giant Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Qu Youqi,? Yin Qiu. [Said the text] Cold and suffocating nose. [Release name] The nasal congestion is called Tong. Tong, for a long time. The tears were blocked for a long time, and it became choked. [Guang Ya] You are sick. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】Autumn season and summer season, people often sneeze.
